snippet: Govind Pansare, 81, was shot along with his wife as they were out walking. He was in critical but stable condition, while she was less seriously hurt.
abstract: Veteran communist leader and outspoken political critic Govind Pansare remains in critical but stable condition following shooting attack in central India; Pansare's wife Uma is wounded less seriously in attack.

byline.original: By SUHASINI RAJ and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: Govind Pansare, 81, was shot along with his wife as they were out walking. He was in critical but stable condition, while she was less seriously hurt.

headline.main: Veteran Communist Leader Is Shot in India
headline.print_headline: Veteran Communist Leader Is Shot in India
